backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining community profiles, messaging, reporting, moderation, eligibility, and authorization using mixins and various maps for state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding new moderation fields and returning updated actor state with banned users and reports.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence definitions mapping feature IDs to associated frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose across routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining the light and dark themed butterfly color palette and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, app title, favicon, and mounting the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React router setup implementing routing, authentication, eligibility gating, and AppShell-wrapped authenticated views.
frontend/src/backendExtensions.d.ts: TypeScript module augmentation defining future backend types and methods for posts, comments, and moderator management.
frontend/src/components/auth/AgeGate.tsx: Displays an age verification screen, handling confirmation and submitting eligibility status with optional logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/BannedScree: Shows a banned account message with optional reason and provides a sign‑out button.
frontend/src/components/helloCorner/Hell: Lets users compose Hello Corner posts with text, optional photo/video uploads, previews, and submission handling.
Renders a single Hello Corner message with author info, media attachments, and reaction controls.
Lists Hello Corner messages with loading, empty, error, and pagination states.
Manages like/dislike reactions for a message, updating counts and user selection.
Combines composer and message list to provide the full Hello Corner posting and browsing section.
Wraps the app with navigation, footer, and ban‑status handling including a loading and banned view.
frontend/src/components/moderation/Repor: Displays a list of reports, handles loading/error states, formats report labels, and allows moderators to resolve reports.
frontend/src/components/moderation/RoleM: Placeholder UI for upcoming moderator role management, showing an admin-only notice.
frontend/src/components/moderation/UserA: Provides tools to validate principals, check ban status, and ban or unban users with reasons.
frontend/src/components/nav/AuthedNav.ts: Navigation bar for authenticated users with conditional moderator link and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages avatar and profile photo selection, previews, validation, and removal with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth, exposing login/logout and principal info while clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useHelloCorner.ts: React-query hooks for listing, creating, and reacting to Hello Corner messages, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login flow, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Adds React Query hooks for moderator actions including roles, reports, and user bans using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for eligibility checks, profiles, mentor directory, contacts, and content reporting via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Connections.tsx: UI page showing a placeholder for user connections with styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/Directory.tsx: Community directory page with filter controls and mentor profile listings fetched via useBrowseMentors.
frontend/src/pages/Feed.tsx: Feed page rendering a community header and HelloCornerSection content.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Displays community guidelines using styled cards outlining behavior, safety, community values, and reporting rules.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, community features, and a login call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/Moderation.tsx: Provides a permission-gated moderation dashboard with tabs for reports, user actions, and admin-only role management.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetail.tsx: Placeholder page showing post details and comments until backend integration is complete.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileMe.tsx: Allows the logged-in user to view and edit their profile, including name, bio, tags, mentoring settings, and photos.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileView.tsx: Shows another user's profile with avatar, bio, and an option to send a connection request.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and manage persisted or sensitive params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and using typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Holds the project's versioned state, summary, and a list of defined features with requirement IDs and metadata.
